channel.title: "You need 99 hitpoints to equip this item." Help

item.title: "You need 99 hitpoints to equip this item." Help
item.dc:creator: @fil55 fil55
item.description:
@fil55 wrote:

So this is a most common problem that people may have using 317 servers. When you have less than 99 hitpoints but have a LEVEL of 99 hitpoints, it comes up with “You need 99 hitpoints to equip this item.” So I searched up in client.java “to equip this item” and I found this

if (playerLevel[playerHitpoints] - CLHitpoints < 0) { sendMessage( "You need " + CLHitpoints + " " + statName[playerHitpoints] + " to equip this item."); GoFalse = true; }
Now from the code above, I would want instead of the hitpoints you are currently on, the Xp you are currently on. (not typed clearly but for example: I have 69/99 hitpoints and I want to equip the hitpoints skillcape and it comes up with that message.)
It will be great if some one can reply on how I can fix this. I would give rep if I can but I can only give rep at 15 rep

Read full topic
item.source: "You need 99 hitpoints to equip this item." Help
